item.title: Globally Q-linear Gauss-Newton Method for Overparameterized Non-convex Matrix Sensing
item.description: A globally Q-linearly converging Gauss-Newton method (AGN) is introduced for overparameterized non-convex low-rank matrix sensing, significantly improving convergence compared to existing gradient des…
